超长距离游泳；马拉松式游泳

list.abstract: swimming（英[ˈswɪmɪŋ]，美[ˈswɪmɪŋ]），英语单词，作名词用，为游泳。短语搭配有swimming pool（游泳）。例句为“They built a new swimming centre.（他们建造了一个新的游泳中心）”。 swimming名词类近义词有natation，形容词类近义词有natatorial，动词类近义词有floating、turning，相关反义词有sink。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和家人一起去游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: It is George's first time at a swimming pool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这次乔治第一次下水游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but in the meantime you could be swimming in it. No, not me. Don't know how.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是在装修之前你还可以在这游泳啊。我不行，我不会游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll just go for a little walk. Good morning, Mr. Pig. I see you have found the swimming pool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去散散步。早上好，猪先生，我看你已经找到游泳池了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll just go for a little walk. Ah. Good morning, Mr. Pig. I see you have found the swimming pool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去散散步。早上好，猪先生，我看你已经找到游泳池了。

yingyinNormal.en: So I, volunteer at the hospital until, like, 2:00, and then I figure we can carpool to the party at the swimming hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我志愿在医院帮忙到2点，然后我们可以拼车去深水潭游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, walking to school together, dancing on tables at bungalow, night swimming at your mom's country house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一起上学，一起在平房里的桌上跳舞，晚上在你妈妈乡村别墅的泳池里游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: The ducks are swimming in their pond. They are very happy. Here are Peppa, George, Mummy Pig, and Daddy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鸭子们都在池塘里游泳。他们游得很开心。佩奇，乔治，猪爸爸，猪妈妈，都来了。

yingyinNormal.en: What is it to be? Car park? Swimming pool? Rocket station ? A house. Can you build it exactly like this please? But bigger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想造什么？停车场？游泳池？火箭站？一座房子！请按照这个模型造就可以了。但是要大一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Or, jump on a ferry to traffic-free Lamma Island and spend the day swimming, exploring villages, and hiking its many trails.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又或者乘搭小轮到清幽的南丫岛，在那里游游泳、看看村庄、行行山，都已经可以花您一整天时间了。

yingyinNormal.en: So tomorrow, when they come home, instead of swimming and all the other little stuff that they want to do, they're going to do their chores. Right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以明天，他们回来以后就不应该去游泳或者玩其它想玩的东西，而是必须先做完家务，对不对？

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Mr. Pig. What is it to be? Car park? Swimming pool? Rocket station ? A house. Can you build it exactly like this please? But bigger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，猪先生！你想造什么？停车场？游泳池？火箭站？一座房子！请按照这个模型造就可以了。但是要大一点。

yingyinNormal.en: It was built by captain Francis Fowke in 1896. He also designed the museum of natural history. It was purely a fan of big, overbearing swimming pool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是弗兰西斯·福克船长1896年建造的，他还设计了自然历史博物馆。这简直像是一个巨大的游泳池。

yingyinNormal.en: Nah, I can't. I got to pick up my mom from her water aerobics class. 18 overweight women flapping their arm fat in a swimming pool. Looks like the manatee tank at Sea World.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不行，我要去水中有氧运动班接我妈。十八个超重妇女在游泳池里甩着肥大的手臂，就像海洋世界里的海牛。

yingyinNormal.en: Big children don't splash. We are very good at swimming. When George and Richard are older, they'll be able to swim like us, won't they, Rebecca? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都不会有那么大的水花。我们游泳游得特别好。等乔治和理查德大一些，他们也会游得像我们那么好。对不对呀，瑞贝卡？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my gosh! Nemo's swimming out to sea!
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，糟了！尼莫正在游向海面！

yingyinNormal.en: He's swimming to the filter! Shark-bait! Not again!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他向过滤器游去了! 鲨鱼饵! 别再这样了!

yingyinNormal.en: It's a big concrete swimming pool with a concrete cover.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个有混凝土保护层的大水泥泳池。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy pig is wearing his swimming costume. Mummy pig is wearing her swimming costume. Peppa is wearing her swimming costume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸穿着泳裤，猪妈妈穿着泳衣，佩奇也穿着泳衣。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are wearing their swimming costumes. Mummy Pig is wearing her swimming costume. And Daddy Pig is wearing his swimming costume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩佩和乔治正在穿他们的泳装！猪妈妈正在穿她的泳装。猪爸爸也在穿他的泳装！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Swimming</highlight> pools, wine tasting, and pink sunsets (at normal evening hours, not 4 in the afternoon) filled the weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游泳池、品酒和粉红色的日落（在正常的晚上，而不是下午4点）占据了整个周末。
